00033 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00034 #include "AWSizeNB1.hpp"
00035 #include "MsqMatrix.hpp"
00036 #include "TMPDerivs.hpp"
00037 #include "TMPCommon.hpp"
00038 
00039 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00040 
00041 std::string AWSizeNB1::get_name() const
00042   { return "AWSizeNB1"; }
00043 
00044 AWSizeNB1::~AWSizeNB1() {}
00045 
00046 template <unsigned DIM> static inline
00047 bool eval( const MsqMatrix<DIM,DIM>& A, 
00048            const MsqMatrix<DIM,DIM>& W, 
00049            double& result)
00050 {
00051   result = det(A) - det(W);
00052   result *= result;
00053   return true;
00054 }
00055 
00056 template <unsigned DIM> static inline
00057 bool grad( const MsqMatrix<DIM,DIM>& A, 
00058            const MsqMatrix<DIM,DIM>& W, 
00059            double& result, 
00060            MsqMatrix<DIM,DIM>& deriv )
00061 {
00062   result = det(A) - det(W);
00063   deriv = transpose_adj(A);
00064   deriv *= 2*result;
00065   result *= result;
00066   return true;
00067 }
00068 
00069 template <unsigned DIM> static inline
00070 bool hess( const MsqMatrix<DIM,DIM>& A, 
00071            const MsqMatrix<DIM,DIM>& W, 
00072            double& result, 
00073            MsqMatrix<DIM,DIM>& deriv, 
00074            MsqMatrix<DIM,DIM>* second )
00075 {
00076   result = det(A) - det(W);
00077   deriv = transpose_adj(A);
00078   set_scaled_outer_product( second, 2.0, deriv );
00079   pluseq_scaled_2nd_deriv_of_det( second, 2*result, A );
00080   deriv *= 2*result;
00081   result *= result;
00082   return true;
00083 }
